trans-unit.source: Gets an XML representation of an object.
trans-unit.target: Gets an XML representation of an object.

trans-unit.source: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema</codeEntityReference> that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <codeEntityReference>M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)</codeEntityReference> method and consumed by the <codeEntityReference>M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)</codeEntityReference> method.
trans-unit.target: An <codeEntityReference>T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema</codeEntityReference> that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <codeEntityReference>M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml(System.Xml.XmlWriter)</codeEntityReference> method and consumed by the <codeEntityReference>M:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml(System.Xml.XmlReader)</codeEntityReference> method.
